import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Axios from "axios"; const FORM_INITIAL = { name: "", email: "", password: "", retype: "", }; export default function Register() { const [formData, setFormData] = React.useState(FORM_INITIAL); React.useEffect(() => { Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/member").then((response) => { console.log(response.data); }); }, []); const submit = () => { Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/api/add", { name: formData.name, email: formData.email, password: formData.password, }).then(() => { alert("Success"); }); }; return ( <>
